scenes.text:
Hey there!
Want to try out the new town security system?
This is a 2 player task, where one of you codes your agent and the other one is the eyes for the coder!
Do you want to be the eyes?

Hi there!
Want to try out the new town security system? This is a two player task where one of you codes your agent and the other one is the eyes for the coder.
This task is the coder. Do you want to be the coder?
